column4: hi there, i am currently downloading the iso and i have one little question ( its the first time using ab debian like system) : will packages (or better sofware like vmware etc.), which are abvailable for debian, run on ubuntu??
debian is not ubuntu, they use different compiles and setups
using packages from debian on ubuntu or vice-versa is unrecommended, and might break your system. Then again, It might not.
